name: WeatherGirl
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weather girl
des:
Weather Girl will check the current weather conditions for your location and let you know if you need to tie your hair up due to wind, or if you could get away with not washing it!


Note:
Data is provided by openweatherapi, your City and Country is used to provide the weather information. This combination must work for the service to work.
